CmdLine: curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | bash - &&     curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - &&     echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list &&     apt-get update && apt-get install -y          nodejs         yarn         wget         jq &&     apt-get -qyy autoremove &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     apt-get -qyy clean
Commands.Name: run
